sect1.title: Adding transaction support
sect1.para: Events are handled in small batches. The size of these batches can be configured on a per- EventListener basis. The event listener can receive notification of a start or end of such a transaction and configure it as desired.

If a transaction manager implements the TransactionAware interface, the beforeTransaction and afterTransaction methods are called prior and after a event handling batch, respectively. The implementation of these method can start transactions to external systems, such as a DBMS.

Alternatively, you can annotate methods with the @BeforeTransaction and @AfterTransaction annotations. These methods may have 1 parameter of typeTransactionStatus. This parameter provides access to the current transaction status and provides options to configure the transaction.
